messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
It's my neighbor. She said someone was in the back of her house with a gun trying to kill her. She ran over here.
Okay, what's the address?
2842 East Mount Tabor Circle, Duluth.
Is someone in her house now?
I don't know. She just ran over here.
Can you ask her if she knows who this person is and if they are still in the house?
She doesn't know who it was. She's hysterical.
Can you ask her what the person looked like and if they are still in the house?
Okay, hold on. Did he have a gun? Yeah, she said he had a gun and tried to shoot her. What's her address? Because mine is 2842.
Is it to the right or left of your house if you are facing it?
It's to the right.
Can you ask her what he looked like or put her on the phone?
Okay, she said he had a gun and tried to shoot her. She thinks he's on the back porch.
Can I talk to her? I need to ask her some questions.
Ma'am, can you tell her what you saw?
I was in the shower and the lights went out. A man came in with a hood on, and he had a knife. He covered my mouth with his hand and told me to be quiet. He had an accent and was dark-skinned.
Okay, what happened next?
He told me to get out of the tub and tried to force me to get in the bed. I told him I had a child and money, and I would give him money to leave me alone.
Okay, did you have any weapons?

I took my .22 and shot him as much as I could, but he kept walking. He went outside through the sliding door and I locked the door and ran to my neighbor's house. He might have taken my other gun, a .380 and a .38 special.
Where are your guns now?
The .22 is empty and the other guns are in my nightstand next to my bed.
Okay, did you put the guns away after you shot him?
No, I think I put the .22 on the floor inside the sliding glass door and then locked it.
Alright, I have officers on the way. Do you need medical attention?
I hurt my back when I fell. He was going to rape and kill me.
Okay, just stay with your neighbor until the officers arrive. Make sure your cat is safe.
Thank you. Please tell the officers not to let my cat out.
The officers are outside your house now. Can you step outside to talk to them?
Okay, but my back hurts so much. Where are they?
They are at your house waiting for you. They will help you.
Alright, I'm going outside now. Please help me.
